Initially intended to help businesses understand consumer trends, Eclipse soon reveals its potential for much darker applications.

As Sam delves deeper into the development of Eclipse, he uncovers a series of mysterious events involving people whose lives have been irrevocably changed by the program. His investigation leads him to a web of corporate espionage, government surveillance, and even murder.
